website_summaries.verdict: A warm snow boot with a unique design that keeps feet dry no matter how wet the snow.
pros: Adjustable upper gives a good fit
cons: The hard lower shell can restrict movement around the ankles

customer_reviews.title: Warm!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very warm for my boys. The liner IS removable, but only if you pull it out on purpose. I like that these boots come up higher on the calf than most snow boots. The lower part of the boot is quite flexible compared to the Sorel snow flurry boots that we have previously used. I will update this review if they don't hold up to little boy abuse. Edited to add: The outer fabric of these boots do absorb water. It is an easy fix with a quick coat or two of Scotchguard.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! Santa brought the purple ones for my daughter for Christmas and I had to find these for my son also. They are so warm and light. My favorite part is the whole rubber bottom and how far up it comes. It seems that so often, under the snow is mud. These are certainly up to any conditions! My kids had both of their pairs absolutely mud covered and filthy and they wiped right off. They were a little more expensive than I wanted to pay, but they are totally worth it. Plus, I bought them big knowing that they can use them next season as well and they don't slip or flop on their feet.
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: These are working great for my son
customer_reviews.text: These are working great for my son. He's played outside in the snow for the last 4 days with no issues. Feet are warm and dry. Fit seems true to size and they are easy on and off. They are also a nice, lighter weight material so they aren't difficult for my son to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoe laces do not tighten
customer_reviews.text: Got them today for my petite 10 year old daughter who wears a size 2 regular. The inside boot cover fit her fine but the boot itself felt bulky & her foot was sliding as she walked. I’m disappointed also that there’s no way to tighten the laces, just draw in the string to close the top part around your calf but it seems flimsy & can only be pulled in so much. I see that snapping & breaking off. Too bad because they are cute, good quality except the shoe lace part. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This boots should be great for my daughter through the cold winter months in ...
customer_reviews.text: This boots should be great for my daughter through the cold winter months in the mountains of Arizona while camping and exploring the wilderness. I like the lightness of the product and the drawstring closure on top. I have had other boots that didn't have this feature and this boot is just that much more convient to keep snow and debris from getting into top of boots. Merrell's design looks solid and will probably last long after she grows out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: I'll return and choose another style
customer_reviews.text: These will be getting returned. Style-wise they were not what I expected. They are...odd looking. In addition the inner liner is not secure to the top of boot so if you just shove your foot in the inner liner will mash down. My son had to reach in and carefully hold the liner while he put his foot in. Absolutely not something I'd expect from Merrel or even a $15 big box store boot.
customer_reviews.author: third time mom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Light, and WARM!
customer_reviews.text: So far we have used these for one snowy winter. They show very little wear and tear. Light and sturdy! He can fit an extra sock if needed. I asked my son to give his review: Easy on/off, warm, comfortable. Waterproof up to the fabric, they don't fall off while playing, perfect height. The lining is removable for faster drying. HINT: My son has a tall foot (high arch & high top of foot), so he needs extra room in the "lace area". These are perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: tawny

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF, HARD TO PUT ON/OFF
customer_reviews.text: I used other Merrell products before, and was surprised to get such a poor quality boots! The blue material of the upper half is not waterproof, and my son’s feet would constantly get soaked with water! I have to always cover that part with waterproof pants, to keep it dry. Also, the boots are very tight at the ankle; it is not easy to put it on/off. Overall style is nice, but quality is not as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He loved the look immediately and didn't hesitate choosing the Merrill
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 10 yr old grandson after letting him choose for himself from 5-6 different known quality brands. He loved the look immediately and didn't hesitate choosing the Merrill. A couple of months into our upstate NY winter, I followed up on him about the boots which appeared still like new in the hands (feet) of this highly active young boy. He LOVES them! He stated that his feet were always warm no matter how long he was out and that even during a "slush puddle battle" with his friends, he never got wet inside the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, easy to use, waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Super light weight and easy to put on and take off. The liner does come out which I don't think is a bad thing. They are waterproof and my 8 year old lives them so far. Only wish I could tighten them more but no complaints. I like them a lot better than some other boots where you are always having to help tighten laces for the kids. Plus these boots seem taller than a lot of other boots. I would recommend, easy to use, light weight, and at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Awful! Defective product the boots don’t stay dry
customer_reviews.text: Awful! This boot is defective my sons socks are wet after every use no matter the amount of snow on the ground. I’m not sure where the water gets in but I am so dissapointed in these boots. Buyer beware would not reccomend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila M

customer_reviews.title: $28 is a good deal and boots labeled -40
customer_reviews.text: Do as reviews suggest and order two sizes up. 9 yo wears 5.5, I got 7. Won't get to test out until fall, but will fit with his socks with room to grow, but not so big as to be clunky. At this price, $28 is a good deal and boots labeled -40, so good for our region.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: I love them but my daughter doesn't
customer_reviews.text: Ok boots. I love them because the are waterproof but my daughter says they are heavy and bulky. Size runs big. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mom Lee

customer_reviews.title: It looks good on my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I always get a size bigger for my children - if it's too big - wear thick socks or two socks. Then they can wear again in a year. We live in an area where it is a hit or miss for snow. Some years, we don't have snow, some years, we do. It looks good on my daughter. I can't complain about the price - getting half of what it is worth.
customer_reviews.author: S. Augustine

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF AT ALL SUPER HARD TO PUT IT ON !
customer_reviews.text: If I can I will send them back but is too late ; ( Not even 1☆ !!!!! Imposible to put foot in and they are 0% waterproof ; ( After seeing my son feet soaking wet I can't believe they sellING them as waterproof! !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality.
customer_reviews.text: We got these for an amazing price, and for the quality I fully expect to be able to hand them down through all 3 daughters. Great style, very warm. I now feel bad that the other kids don't have as nice of boots as these! Really good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jjpm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boots
customer_reviews.text: These snow boots are great. I purchased these boots for my 4 year old daughter. They are great for the snow. The bottom rubber portion keep her feet dry. The insulation keeps her feet warm. She has never complained. We have spent a lot of time outside in the snow without any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my granddaughter for warmth. They were worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome snow boots for school. We live in the snowy Rocky Mountains, and the kids trudge through snow to and from the bus and at recess when they go outside. These are great because they are so light, warm, and completely water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Family of Five

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit, had to return
customer_reviews.text: Loved how lightweight these are but they are a weird fit. Ran small so had to order a size up and those were fine for the foot size but too tight to put jeans in the shaft. Too bad. Had to return both pairs. My daughter really loved the style.
customer_reviews.author: jkbmsn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY NICE BOOTS, BOUGHT THEM FOR MY 12 YR OLD AND HE DEFINETELY LIKES THEM =)
customer_reviews.author: #Momoffour

customer_reviews.title: Cute, warm boots!
customer_reviews.text: Got these boots at a great price on Amazon just in time for the first snow. It's easy enough to get them on my 3 y olds feet after some practice. We spent hours in the snow and his feet were warm and dry when I took them off. My son has wide feet, and even though I got him a 12 M they are wide enough to fit him comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Hanni107

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Affordable in this color!
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, well made. Have not tried out in wet or snow conditions yet. Will update when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Emme Elle

customer_reviews.title: Too tight.
customer_reviews.text: Boots are as advertised. But the waterproof bottom half (which is part of what I loved about these boots) is too tight around my son's ankles. It's a hard rubber so it rubs his ankles in an uncomfortable way. He won't wear them. Length was fine. Boot seemed fine otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great winter boot
customer_reviews.text: Love these books, fits well, good quality you expect of Merell products. Love the waterproof foot and easy on and off! Overall a great winter boot. My son says his feet stay warm and dry!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Beindit

customer_reviews.title: Pretty boots, but hard to put on and take off!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very nice looking. They come up high so that no snow gets in. The only problem we have is that they are a bit hard to put on and take off. They are a pull-on boots, which in theory is nice, but they have a narrow opening with no give, so my six-year-old has a hard time pulling them on and taking them off.
customer_reviews.author: Liz C

customer_reviews.title: love these boots for my child - easy to put ...
customer_reviews.text: love these boots for my child - easy to put on - no velcro straps and keep the feet dry and warm - and super lightweight!!
customer_reviews.author: k&b

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are for my son and he likes how easy they are to put on and take off. They are a great pair of boots and seem tp actually be waterproof as well. They fit just as I expected them to fit.
customer_reviews.author: OrganicMom

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great except the insert came out and my daughter never told me. She still wears them and hasn't complained about them being uncomfortable. We got a great price.
customer_reviews.author: noelle hoori

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, but runs large.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good boot, but they seem to run a whole size bigger than marked. My son wears a 3 in about every other shoe he owns, these boots were closer to a 4 or 4.5.
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: Not very warm
customer_reviews.text: Over priced, not warm, nice looking in app but in real life cheap looking
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Great boots !
customer_reviews.text: These winter boots are very comfortable and warm. They are very deep and are easily pulled tight to keep snow out. My young daughters stand up and slip them easily on there feet and do not need to sit and pull them on like other boots we have bought them in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Catrina

customer_reviews.title: Too small and not easy to fit
customer_reviews.text: The boots were georgeus and well made. However, they were too small (my 4 y.o. daughter wears size 10 and I ordered 11 and they were not big enough). Also, I found them too long and difficult to put them on. I returned them
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put on
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot, difficult to put on due to it being the type of boot that has a liner. Even with the liner out of the boot and put on the foot separately, it is difficult to put the boot on.
customer_reviews.author: J. Goldman

customer_reviews.title: seems durable
customer_reviews.text: My son received these for Christmas and loved that you can slide them right on! They looked very large but have a thick inner shell. I didn't try to take the shell out. I bought them a size larger hoping they fit next year as well.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Son is 11 and loves these boots! Slip on and off with ease! Lightweight but tough!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews I did order 1 size up. They fit a little big. My son’s feet stay warm and dry. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ashley West

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: My son's feet starting getting cold and wet in these boots and I did not like the boot liner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot.
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. Fits, easy to get on and off and looks really cool. Have not gotten enough snow yet to really put them through their test, but still waiting. Will update once we have been able to really give them a work out.
customer_reviews.author: ACMC

customer_reviews.title: Working
customer_reviews.text: No complaints for 8 year old, easy to put on and take off!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Removable lining
customer_reviews.text: Just got them today, and my son loves them already. However, the lining is removable (unlike previous review stated).
customer_reviews.author: sonata

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These boots came just in time for the snow. My older daughter just loves them and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gladman

customer_reviews.title: Seem very durable
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the boots and says it keeps his feet warm. They are a bit bigger than expected but I don't mind because thick socks will help. He only plans to use it for snowy days anyway.
customer_reviews.author: M V

customer_reviews.title: Warm and dry
customer_reviews.text: These boots keep my feet warm and dry. I used them to hike in the Pacific Northwest last month.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Dryburgh

customer_reviews.title: Always Dry and Warm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots for my 3 year old son. He loves these because they are easy enough for him to slip on by himself. His feet are always dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just figured Merrill Boots would have held up a little better..
customer_reviews.text: The boots are warm, there is no complaints about that from my son. But the draw string at the top of the boot ripped out after the 2nd time wearing. It doesn't affect the boot at all, just figured Merrill Boots would have held up a little better..
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for our Alaska life!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible for our Alaska life! No leaks, comfortable, well made, warm, and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Kosal

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable liner
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap and the liner was bulky and bunched up too easily and seemed to have a weird seam. My son would wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly DeMoss

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great item, keeps my kids feet warm and dry. No complaints!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots! Great for our winters! My son loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. However, the inserts tend to get wet after a prolonged time in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: H. I. Odogba

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent in every aspect, my kids super love it. There's is no way to get wet.
customer_reviews.author: listener

customer_reviews.title: Good quality warm boot.
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. Nice and warm. Has held up nicely to many hours of outside play. Good color.
customer_reviews.author: Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! No more complaints about cold feet when we play in the snow for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Essary

customer_reviews.title: Great snow boots
customer_reviews.text: Needed some warm winter boots for my son. Ordered them and I am not disappointed. They fit as expected and keeps his feet dry and warm with just a regular pair of socks.
customer_reviews.author: 1Schwob

customer_reviews.title: Merrill makes quality footwear!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are really nice. Perfect height for a snow boot and light weight too!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa  Coakley

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful love them i ordered a little larger because for my daughter who wears size 3 and they fit perfect at size 4. They also keep her feet very nice and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Infinitely Lost!!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My 10yr old loves them, they fit true to size. Easy to slip on and tighten.
customer_reviews.author: jen3

customer_reviews.title: The size is good and my son loves the boots
customer_reviews.text: The size is good and my son loves the boots! They are perfect for the wet, cold, and snowy conditions in Juneau, Alaska. The boot seems to be well made and is a nice design for somewhat narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good quality boot
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, a little heavier than I expected, but perhaps that is because they are not made from cheap materials?
customer_reviews.author: MJ Richards

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and warm
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my son to walk to the bus stop. He says they are very comfy and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Brischetto

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These boot are great, daughter has worn them playing outside in the snow for well over two hours and no complaints of her feet getting wet or being cold. She also wears them for snowshoeing. Great purchase and will definitely purchase again in the future :)
customer_reviews.author: Diana Wilmes

customer_reviews.title: sturdy & warm
customer_reviews.text: My son hasn't worn these yet but the product feels sturdy and layered well for the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Janeth

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bogs!
customer_reviews.text: My first time getting my kids Merrell winter boots. Typically we go with Sorel. These were absolutely wonderful! Kept her feet very warm and she loved how lightweight they were. In my opinion, these are far better than Bogs.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Fagairo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome for kiddos. Happy to find dry socks and warm feet when these come off!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Cold feet no more!
customer_reviews.text: It's been ridiculously cold here this winter. For the first time this season, my first grader has said his little feet stayed warm while playing outside. I'm thrilled with the quality and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Villani

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 7 in women's shoes. I bought a size 6 and have extra room for thick socks. I got them at an excellent price in the purple color.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect snow boot
customer_reviews.text: Look great, very warm, easy on/off, light and comfortable and affordable. My son loves them, perfect for our cold snowy winters.
customer_reviews.author: josh jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice. served purpose during travel to lake tahoe esp. in snow storm.
customer_reviews.author: Murthy

customer_reviews.title: Warm boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great! We have had negative temperatures for the last month and my son has not complained once about his feet while outside shoveling/playing.
customer_reviews.author: Loni

customer_reviews.title: pinky boot
customer_reviews.text: My daughter liked it too much. In winter season, it worked well to keep my daughter's feet dry and warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boot / Great Quality / Great Price
customer_reviews.text: WOW I love these boots. They are very good quality, very durable. They were even cuter than the picture. The shipment was fast also.
customer_reviews.author: Mil

customer_reviews.title: He loves them and feels comfortable wearing them
customer_reviews.text: Waiting for a snow storm to come to test the boots. He loves them and feels comfortable wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great. It was delivered earlier than expected
customer_reviews.text: The boots look the same as its pictured. The quality is great. It was delivered earlier than expected. Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent in every aspect, my kids super love it. There's is no way to get wet.
customer_reviews.author: listener

customer_reviews.title: Good boots. Would buy again when outgrow these ones
customer_reviews.text: The liner slips but it could be because they are somewhat large for my son. He just wears two pairs of socks and it solves it. Otherwise he loves them. Warm feet for a very active outside kid
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: They are warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes these boots. They are warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 boys

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Warm and dry but if you are hiking through slush the cloth parts will get wet
customer_reviews.author: Heather Nanartowich

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! My son loves them. Came just in time for the Montana snow season.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Roussos

customer_reviews.title: Very well insulated boots for 20* plus weather for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well insulated boots for 20* plus weather for a child, boots fit as expected and seem durable for outside play so far in the Colorado snow.
customer_reviews.author: Karl S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have had for over 2 mos. Seem to keep our 10 year olds feet warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca ferber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son used them for a whole week in winter and he was fascinated.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos J. Olivar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to street shoe size. Our 9 year old daughter loves these!
customer_reviews.author: 🄳🄴🄲🄺🄴🅁  🄵🄰🄼🄸🄻🅈

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boots for the money! Purchased for my son. They fit and look great! These appear that they will last for much more than one winter season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: True to size. My son loves it and keeps his feet warm and dry!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The liners pop out pretty easy which my only complaint
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. My son likes to run in the snow and they don't slow him down. The liners pop out pretty easy which my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Sean S Meara

customer_reviews.title: Easy for her to take off by herself
customer_reviews.text: Fit daughter well. Easy for her to take off by herself
customer_reviews.author: DynamiteD

customer_reviews.title: The strap broke on the first use.
customer_reviews.text: The strap broke on the first use. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Angela lago

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very happy with them! Great price in the purple color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boots, great price, great brand. Size run a little big, but my son will grow into them so we didn't exchange them.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wide fit, even for my son who has a wider foot.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M

customer_reviews.title: These are not -40F lol but they are the best.
customer_reviews.text: I like these boots, their is no better feeling knowing that my kid is going outside with out cold wet feet, that being said they are tight around the ankle and offer no flex so its hard for my 6year old with a 12.5 to make it work and get her foot in the hole, but when they are in their is no better boot. And what's the deal with a -40F and then a -40C what a joke like who ever is responsible for that should be forced to learn the difference duh.
customer_reviews.author: Titus Giaimo

customer_reviews.title: ... because the lining is NOT removable and he can easily slide his feet in and out
customer_reviews.text: My son likes these boots because the lining is NOT removable and he can easily slide his feet in and out. Other boots with removeable linings drive him crazy. We have tried many brands and styles, but these are his favorite winter boots so far!
customer_reviews.author: AAL

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My stepdaughter likes them and says they fit well and keep her feet warm. Minus one star for the fact that the liner is detached from the rest of the boot, which means occasionally I have to adjust it for her.
customer_reviews.author: wysiwyg

customer_reviews.title: After one time use at snow play, both got ...
customer_reviews.text: After one time use at snow play, both got water inside. This product is defective! Be aware !!! He played around snow area for 2 hours. Both sides got water....
customer_reviews.author: Kazuko Obuchi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots BUT..
customer_reviews.text: Says snow but only rated to 40degrees... so these are more like a rain boot. Has a removable insulated boot that makes it impossible to put on without removing and inserting foot with it on, or it slides down and u can't get foot in. Other than that these boots are really nice looking!
customer_reviews.author: CUTLIPS

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, insulation is great! I recommend this product to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sad
customer_reviews.text: product came damaged and was the ripped piece placed inside the boot as if no one checked the item after it was returned damaged by someone else.
customer_reviews.author: honesty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect shoes for cold or rainy winter, waterproof and very warm, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bohemienne

product_meta.title: Merrell Snow Quest Lite Waterproof Snow Boot (Little Kid/Big Kid)
product_meta.description:
Waterproof, lightweight snow boot

Disclaimer: Merrell temperature ratings are general guidelines for warmth and comfort. How you feel temperature depends on a variety of factors. At different activity levels individuals will experience different metabolic rates which can be influenced by many other variables such as weather conditions, exposure time, clothing and cold sensitivity.

Double toggle closure for adjustability and a snug fit
feature_bullets: IMEVA shell with 360 degree flex for a lightweight, comfortable fit
Temperature rated to -25 degrees to ensure a warm wearing experience
Hook and loop closure for a secure fit
Removable liner for easy drying with thermolite insulation for ultra warmth
M-select dry waterproof nylon and EVA shell upper to keep feet dry
